channel.title: Posts on Fred's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Fred's blog

item.title: Let's make our own blogs.
item.description: 1. Blog. Nowadays, when we want to create a blog website, we don’t need to write so much codes of front end, back-end or even set up resources for the website. Thanks to our Open source community. At all times, we can use many blog engines for setting our own blogs, which is a very convenient way to make it done. This article will show you some basic process to complete this task.
